    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent.BitChannelMapper
      Private subclass to handle Channels that are mapping to one bit of a Modbus Unsigned Word element
      static class  AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent.BitConverter 
      class  AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent.ChannelMapper
      Maps an Element to one or more ModbusChannels using converters, that convert the value forward and backwards.
      class  AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent.DoubleWordBitChannelMapper
      Handles channels that are mapping to one bit of a modbus unsigned double word element
      class  AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent.DoubleWordByteChannelMapper
      Handles channels that are mapping two bytes of a modbus unsigned double word element

      • activate

        protected void activate(java.lang.String id)

      • activate

        protected void activate(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext context,
                        java.lang.String servicePid,
                        java.lang.String id,
                        boolean enabled,
                        int unitId,
                        org.osgi.service.cm.ConfigurationAdmin cm,
                        java.lang.String modbusReference,
                        java.lang.String modbusId)
        Call this method from Component implementations activate().
        Parameters:
        context - ComponentContext of this component. Receive it from parameter for @Activate
        servicePid - The service_pid of this Component. Typically 'config.service_pid()'
        id - ID of this component. Typically 'config.id()'
        enabled - Whether the component should be enabled. Typically 'config.enabled()'
        unitId - Unit-ID of the Modbus target
        cm - An instance of ConfigurationAdmin. Receive it using @Reference
        modbusReference - The name of the @Reference setter method for the Modbus bridge - e.g. 'Modbus' if you have a setModbus()-method
        modbusId - The ID of the Modbus brige. Typically 'config.modbus_id()'
